channel.title: New to RSP
channel.description:
Hello guys, I thought about hosting a RS server. Well, this is my very first time into PRSs So I have very small knowledge about how everything works I tried to take a look at some RS files yesterday, I logged in etc. I was into Tibia OTS developing tho. IDK if anyone have heard about tibia before. Which is totally different. 2D gaming. Coding via LUA and C+/++ PHP etc. So I need someone to guide me somehow. I have a lot of questions haha, Cuz this seems very different! If it's fine with anyone to add on skype so I can ask etc? bec the tutorials etc are very bad written and doesn't include basics things u know
Skype: Amir.Amoore

item.title: New to RSP
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

If you have done some C+ or any C variant, then Java shouldn’t be too hard, they both use very similar syntax’s. Read some tutorials and try to mess around with features on your source and client.

Read full topic
